answers.author: Robert Kiely
answers.text:
Debra, about 7 to 10 years ago the City of Lake Forest appointed a similar "Blue Ribbon" Committee made up of local residents. If you are interested I can send you some materials. Feel free to contact me.

answers.author: Deborah Yukolis
answers.text:
Mesa established a “Financing the Future” committee in the 90’s.  It was a very staff-intensive effort.  The staff here who lead the effort are since retired.  However, we do still have someone who helped support the committee.  If you’d like more insight into his reflections about the experience, please call Chuck Odom at 480-644-3391

author: Debra Shackett
text: Does anyone have a template or model for an advisory Finance Committee?  We're considering putting together a group of interested professionals from the community to review the county's financial position and perhaps create a long term plan.
title: Finance Committee?
